snippet: The gun-buyback program at the Basilica of St. Mary of Guadalupe in Mexico City has drawn an array of people. These are some of the 3,500 weapons turned in thus far to a tent outside the holy shrine.
lead_paragraph: The gun-buyback program at the Basilica of St. Mary of Guadalupe in Mexico City has drawn an array of people. These are some of the 3,500 weapons turned in thus far to a tent outside the holy shrine.
